name: SyntheticSnakeOilOnlineSecurityTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
David Papp - Tech Expert, Creator, and Entrepreneur will take you for a tour of the tech landscape and open your eyes to the world of Cybersecurity. In the modern age of Synthetic Snake Oil, David will share the scams, ploys, and traps used by the unscrupulous and unethical to take control of your security, data, identity, or hard earned money. 

His tips will help you improve your personal security, safety, and create awareness of the modern dangers that allow the more vulnerable members of our world to fall prey to carefully planned ploys targeting the young, the elderly, and the uninformed. Remember, this is what the bad guys do full time. They are extremely good at what they do. Keep yourself safe from Dr. Evil.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
